question.text:
Match List - I with List - II.
\(\begin{array}{ll}
& \text { List - I } & & \text { List - II } \\
& \text { (Complex) } & & \text { (Hybridisation & Magnetic characters) } \\
\text{(A)} & \left[\mathrm{MnBr}_4\right]^{2-} & \text{(I)} & d^2 s^3 \text{ & diamagnetic} \\
\text{(B)} & \left[\mathrm{FeF}_6\right]^{3-} & \text{(II)} & \mathrm{sp}^3 \mathrm{~d}^2 \text{ & paramagnetic} \\
\text{(C)} & \left[\mathrm{Co}\left(\mathrm{C}_2 \mathrm{O}_4\right)_3\right]^{3-} & \text{(III)} & \mathrm{sp}^3 \text{ & diamagnetic} \\
\text{(D)} & \left[\mathrm{Ni}(\mathrm{CO})_4\right] & \text{(IV)} & \mathrm{sp}^3 \text{ & paramagnetic}
\end{array}\)
Choose the correct answer from the options given below :

solution.text:
$\begin{aligned} & \text { (A) }\left[\mathbf{M n B r}_4\right]^{2-} \\ & \mathrm{Mn}^{+2} \Rightarrow[\mathrm{Ar}] 3 \mathrm{~d}^5 \end{aligned}$ In presence of ligand field
$\Rightarrow \mathrm{sp}^3$ hybridization, paramagnetic in nature (B) $\left[\mathrm{FeF}_6\right]^{3-}$ $\mathrm{Fe}^{+3} \Rightarrow[\mathrm{Ar}] 3 \mathrm{~d}^5$ In presence of ligand field< img src="https://cdn-question-pool.getmarks.app/pyq/jee_main/y10TyOKG-U3RTkeCvMTTLyYSHOIIJiDbtgz8oSi4Qq8.original.fullsize.png">
$\Rightarrow \mathrm{sp}^3 \mathrm{~d}^2$ hybridization, paramagnetic in nature (C) $\left[\mathrm{Co}\left(\mathrm{C}_2 \mathrm{O}_4\right)_3\right]^{3-}$ $\mathrm{Co}^{+3} \Rightarrow[\mathrm{Ar}] 3 \mathrm{~d}^6$ In presence of ligand field
$\Rightarrow d^2 \mathrm{sp}^3$ hybridization, diamagnetic in nature (D) $\left[\mathrm{Ni}(\mathrm{CO})_4\right]$ $\mathrm{Ni}^0 \Rightarrow[\mathrm{Ar}] 3 \mathrm{~d}^8 4 \mathrm{~s}^2$ In presence of ligand field
$\Rightarrow \mathrm{sp}^3$ hybridization, diamagnetic in nature
